text: Ergi is an old Norse word. Ergi may also refer to: ==Given name== *Ergi Borshi (born 1995), Albanian football *Ergi Dini (1994–2016), Albanian singer, winner of the third season of X Factor Albania *Ergi Kırkın (born 1999), Turkish tennis player *Ergi Tırpancı (born 2000), Turkish basketball player ==Other uses== *ERGI, or ERG Iserlohn, a roller hockey team from Iserlohn, Germany. ==See also== *Ergis (disambiguation)
title: Ergi (disambiguation)
